THEBROWSR: 1. For best performance you can install browsers on below list, or also can use any browser can able to install the extensions at store.
CLICK_TO_SHARE: Click here to share your current filter.
MUST_RULES_SELF: You must enable vanced adblock first, then write fittler, check documentation now
NWE_NEED_HRELP_H3: We need your help to better serve and continue offering new functionalities...

UPDATE_TOUSE: Please update to latest version to use these option
INTRO: LFJ required userscript manager extensions for install, and runs best with the latest version of all chromium-based browsers, also support for firefox, pc, laptop, tablet and mobile..
ANTIADBLOCK_E: Using hotkey [ALT+A] to activate [A]nti-Adblock Killer on any sites that killed/detected your adblock.
XVIDEO_UNLOCK_E: Free watching red video at xvideos.com and gold videos at xnxx.com.
PORNHUB_UNLOCK_E: Free watching premium video at pornhub.com.
UNLOCK_YOUTUBE_E: Remove ads on youtube.., see how it works
NO_TRAFFIC_E: Add nofollow noopener noreferrer into all hyperlink, modify referrer-policy header of all website's to hide your traffic across domains. You can test referrer here
GODMODE_E: Allow hotkey [ALT+CAPS LOCK] to activate Godmode on a specified site, it's allow you to edit, copy, right-click, use context menu, text select(for copy), use devtools, debugging...
ANOTHEROPTION_E: Want more feature ? contact us for feature request.
SITE_EXCLUDE: LFJ not working at the banking and payment gateway sites, such as:
SITE_PREMIUM: Patched: You can access to some or all premium features of the website.
WAITFOR_E: Set maximum execution time LFJ wait for download url to fetched, then forced to close tab (slow connection need longer time to execute script), this settings work at supported file hosting, check list here ...
ADBLOCKCUSTOM: LFJ allows to block any element/javascript scripts that annoyed you. Just create custom block filter for website you want to visit, then share it, or import available filters from LFJ libraries that other users have shared. view quick start guide, or documentation
ADD_DOMAIN: If your preferred name is not listed, just add them to the list.
CLIPBROAD_U_E: (2) Upload clipboard image with Ctrl+V/Paste shortcut in everywhere.
HOTUPLOAD_U_E: (1) Using hotkey [ALT+Shift] in everywhere to upload image from file
VANCED_HELPER_E: Auto download mediafire.com, soundcloud.com ..., unlock "Social Locker" module of wordpress, see how it works
